tool_description: F1 Fantasy API to retrieve driver & team data.
name: Formula 1 Fantasy
title: Formula 1 Fantasy

api_list.name: Teams
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://formula-1-fantasy.p.rapidapi.com/teams"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "formula-1-fantasy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Game data
api_list.description: Get game data. This contains previous, current & upcoming GP data, drivers & constructors championship standings & more.
